lines: Wendo waku Wee Mũkũũri, Nĩũkĩrĩte mothe!
Ikaraga thĩini witũ, Gĩkeno kĩa matu-inĩ.
Jesũ, Wee wĩ wa tha nyingĩ, Mũtheru mũohanĩri,
Kenia ũrĩa wĩ na kĩeha, ũmũgirie maithori.
Iyũria Roho wa wendo, Gĩkundi-inĩ gĩaku;
Reke tũgĩe na gĩkeno, Kĩrĩa gĩa kĩĩranĩro.
Theria ngoro ciitũ rĩu, Mwambĩrĩria mũrĩĩkia,
Tũhe wĩtĩkio mũiganu, Nĩguo tuume ũkombo-inĩ.
Nĩtũgũgũkumia rĩu, O hamwe na Araika,
Mwathani, rĩĩkia wĩra rĩu, thĩinĩ wa ngoro ciitũ;
No gĩthaambie ciũmbe ciaku, kahinda-inĩ gaka;
Tũhuurũke meehia mothe, Tũtoonye gwaku igũrũ.
